summary: Aegis Sovereign - Enterprise Meeting Intelligence & Privacy Suite with multi-page architecture being expanded into high-density Enterprise Ecosystem on ICP with role-based access control, admin panel, and Motoko backend for persistent data storage
architectural_notes: Tech stack: React, Node.js, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, Supabase Auth
UI components: Shadcn/UI with Tabs and Sheets for navigation
Glassmorphism design with Midnight (#000000) backgrounds and Border-Beam animations
All page transitions must use Framer Motion
Multi-page architecture with persistent sidebar navigation
60fps Canvas-based visualizations for neural frequency display
ApexCharts for sentiment tracking and analytics
Global hotkeys: Ctrl+Shift+P (Panic), Ctrl+Shift+L (Lag), CMD+K (Tactical Layer toggle)
Skeleton loaders, Sonner toast notifications, and magnetic button hover effects
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Modern minimalist Aegis Sovereign logo featuring a shield with neural network pattern, designed for enterprise security software with clean lines and professional aesthetic suitable for tech applications (aegis-logo.dim_256x256.png)
- Favicon version of the Aegis Sovereign logo optimized for small display at 32x32 pixels with high contrast and recognizable symbol (aegis-favicon.dim_32x32.png)
- PWA app icon featuring the Aegis Sovereign logo on transparent or solid background optimized for mobile home screens at 192x192 pixels (aegis-icon-192.dim_192x192.png)
- High-resolution PWA app icon for high-DPI displays at 512x512 pixels (aegis-icon-512.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create a public landing page with hero section displaying 'Neural Meeting Intelligence for Global Leaders', security architecture sections for Quantum-Resistant Encryption, SOC2 Type II Compliance, and Biometric Integrity, and a 3-tier pricing table showing Professional (Free), Enterprise ($49/mo), and Sovereign ($149/mo) tiers
Implement authentication system allowing users to sign up and log in to access the dashboard
Create Command Center dashboard page with Bento Grid layout using midnight black (#000000) backgrounds and glassmorphism styling
Implement Neural Frequency Visualizer component that renders a 60fps Canvas-based wave animation reacting to simulated real-time audio data in the top card of the Command Center
Create Sentiment Radar component using ApexCharts Area Chart that displays live sentiment pulse tracking Vocal Stress and Emotional Tension metrics with interactive chart controls
Implement Meeting ROI Ticker that displays a live counter tracking meeting costs in Indian Rupees (â‚¹) per second
Create Speaker Identity Matrix component as a scrolling feed that tags participants by vocal frequency characteristics

Create Neural Lab dedicated page featuring vocal cloning interface with drag-and-drop zones for vocal sample uploads, circular neural progress animation showing synthesis status, Voice Health dashboard displaying vocal metrics, and a Synthesize button that triggers a high-end loading sequence
Implement AI Mirror status indicator displaying 'Neural Proxy Ready' when vocal synthesis is complete and auto-vocal response is available
Create hidden Sentinel Protocol page accessible via CMD+K toggle, styled as a tactical HUD with dark theme and military-grade interface aesthetics

Implement Panic Protocol feature that triggers a full-screen overlay displaying either 'System Update' or 'Critical Failure' message with screen-glitch visual effects and looping audio simulation when activated via Ctrl+Shift+P hotkey

Create Environment Spoofing feature with 16 high-fidelity audio loop cards (Office, Private Jet, Cafe, Airport, and 12 additional environments) each with play/stop toggle controls and environment-specific icons
Implement Packet Jitter Simulator with slider control that manually degrades audio quality to simulate robot or broken voice effects, activated via Ctrl+Shift+L hotkey
Create Hardware Mimicry feature with selectable fake OS update screens for Windows 11 and macOS that can be displayed during screen-shares
Create Device Sync page featuring a large QR code for mobile device pairing and a live connection log that displays real-time code-style log entries when devices connect
Implement WebSocket synchronization using Socket.io to enable real-time communication between laptop and mobile devices with sub-30ms latency for tactical protocol triggers
Create Analytics & Vault page displaying a list of past meeting logs with encrypted lock icons and detailed post-meeting reports with AI-generated action items

Create mobile tactical remote route at /remote optimized for PWA with full-screen interface, large haptic-feedback tactical buttons for panic protocol, lag simulation, and environment controls at 120Hz refresh rate
Implement PWA manifest and service worker enabling the /remote route to be added to mobile home screen with a professional Aegis icon
Implement persistent sidebar navigation with Shadcn/UI components allowing users to switch between Command Center, Neural Lab, Sentinel Protocol, Device Sync, and Analytics & Vault pages
Implement Framer Motion page transitions for all route changes with smooth animations between pages
Implement Border-Beam light-trail animations on Bento Grid cards to create visual interest and premium feel
Implement Sonner toast notifications for user feedback and skeleton loaders for async content loading throughout the application
Implement magnetic button hover effects with smooth attraction animations throughout the interface
Investigate and fix React error #185 (hydration/rendering mismatch) that occurs immediately after user signup when navigating to the dashboard
Ensure SignupPage.tsx properly handles the signup flow and redirects to dashboard only after Internet Identity authentication and backend user creation are both complete
Verify that ProtectedRoute.tsx correctly handles the authenticated state during initial navigation after signup without triggering rendering errors
Add error boundary components to gracefully catch and display React errors instead of showing minified error messages to users

Create System Audit Trail side panel component that displays auto-scrolling terminal-style logs with green text (#00FF00) on black background, simulating packet encryption logs with entries like '[ENCRYPT] AES-256 Key Rotated' and '[SENSORY] Acoustic Masking Active'

Create Biometric Stress Radar bento card component featuring a spider/radar chart that displays 5 metrics: Executive Stress, Vocal Stability, Background Noise, Packet Health, and Privacy Score with live-updating data

Create Global Node Map component displaying a minimalist SVG world map with animated glowing ping effects in major cities (San Francisco, London, Tokyo, Bangalore) to visualize Aegis global infrastructure
Integrate System Audit Trail, Biometric Stress Radar, and Global Node Map into Command Center page layout, positioning them appropriately within the existing bento grid structure
Hide /sentinel and /admin-panel routes from USER role users in the frontend navigation and routing logic
Expand Command Center dashboard to full-width 12-column grid layout with high information density design
Create Neural Packet Stream component displaying scrolling terminal logs with real-time encryption events
Create Sovereign Orb 3D CSS component with Framer Motion ripple effects on hover
Create Waterfall Spectrogram component using HTML5 Canvas with neon green frequencies flowing top-to-bottom
Create Environment Mixer component with 8 tactical volume sliders for different environments with pulsing icons
Enhance Panic Protocol to display fullscreen fixed un-closable Windows 11 Update overlay
Create Ghost Mode toggle that applies global blur effect to obfuscate all dashboard data for instant privacy
Update DashboardLayout sidebar to 60px collapsed / 240px expanded glassmorphic design with PRO admin badge
Create Admin Panel route at /admin-panel with user management interface showing all users and their roles
Add 'Status: Active' green pulse indicators to all dashboard components showing live data
Simplify the authentication flow to ensure users can successfully sign up via Internet Identity and be redirected to the Command Center dashboard without hydration or rendering errors
Ensure ProtectedRoute component correctly handles authentication state transitions without triggering React rendering errors
Verify that the Command Center dashboard renders correctly on first visit after signup with all components loading without errors
Ensure role-based route protection works correctly for /sentinel and /admin-panel routes after successful authentication
Replace the existing Aegis Sovereign logo with a new logo design across all instances in the application including the landing page header, dashboard sidebar, PWA manifest icons, and favicon

new_feature_requests.summary: Command Center dashboard with Bento Grid layout, sentiment pulse chart, neural frequency visualizer, meeting ROI ticker, and speaker identity matrix
Neural Lab page for vocal cloning with drag-and-drop zones, neural progress animation, voice health dashboard, and synthesize functionality
Sentinel Protocol hidden page with tactical HUD, 16 environment spoof cards, emergency panic button, packet jitter slider, and fake OS update selectors
Device Sync page with QR code for mobile pairing and live connection log
Analytics & Vault page with encrypted meeting logs and AI-generated post-meeting reports
Public landing page with hero video, security whitepaper section, and 3-tier pricing table (Professional Free, Enterprise $49/mo, Sovereign $149/mo)
Mobile tactical remote route (/remote) with full-screen interface and large haptic buttons optimized for PWA
WebSocket sync using Socket.io for <30ms latency between devices with global hotkeys support
Store meeting session data including duration, participants, sentiment analysis results, and cost calculations in the backend for display in Analytics & Vault

System Audit Trail side panel with auto-scrolling terminal-style log displaying encryption packet logs like [ENCRYPT] AES-256 Key Rotated and [SENSORY] Acoustic Masking Active in green text on black background
Biometric Stress Radar bento card featuring spider/radar chart with 5 metrics: Executive Stress, Vocal Stability, Background Noise, Packet Health, and Privacy Score
Global Node Map showing minimalist SVG world map with glowing ping animations in major cities (SF, London, Tokyo, Bangalore) to visualize global infrastructure
Implement Principal Operator system assigning ADMIN role to user's Internet Identity principal with role-based access control hiding /sentinel and /admin-panel for USER roles
Create Motoko backend to persist Meeting Logs and Panic History in stable memory
Expand Command Center to 12-column grid layout filling 100% browser width with high information density
Create Neural Packet Stream scrolling terminal module with real-time logs like [ENCRYPT] AES-256 Key Rotated
Create Sovereign Orb 3D CSS centerpiece with Framer Motion ripple effects on hover
Create Waterfall Spectrogram HTML5 Canvas component with neon green frequencies flowing top-to-bottom
Create Environment Mixer with 8 tactical volume sliders (Office, Rain, Cafe, etc.) with pulsing icons in Sentinel Protocol
Enhance Panic Trigger to display fullscreen fixed un-closable Windows 11 Update overlay
Create Ghost Mode global blur toggle that obfuscates all data for instant privacy
Update persistent sidebar to 60px/240px glassmorphic design with PRO admin badge
Setup modular routing for /dashboard, /neural, /sentinel, /vault, and /admin-panel pages
Add Status: Active green pulse indicators to all components with high information density design
Implement role-based access control system with ADMIN and USER roles stored in Motoko backend, assigning ADMIN role to the owner's Internet Identity principal
Persist Meeting Logs and Panic History in Motoko backend stable memory with CRUD operations
Record Panic Protocol activations to backend including timestamp, trigger type, and user principal
Simplify the backend user creation flow to handle role assignment reliably during signup
Change/update the logo for the Aegis Sovereign application
